entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 3:30 PM NST Saturday 04 March 2023
Temperature: -5.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -11.6°C
Wind: WNW 44 km/h gust 56 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 in the Port aux Basques area. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 in the Port aux Basques area. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to zero in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature rising to zero in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 March 2023
